suggestionPrompts.label: Investment Advice
suggestionPrompts.prompt: I need help with investment advice. Can you guide me through creating a diversified portfolio based on my risk tolerance and financial goals?
suggestionPrompts.description: Get personalized investment strategies and portfolio recommendations

suggestionPrompts.label: Retirement Planning
suggestionPrompts.prompt: I want to plan for retirement. Can you help me understand how much I should save, what retirement accounts to use, and create a timeline?
suggestionPrompts.description: Plan your retirement with 401k, IRA, and savings strategies

suggestionPrompts.label: Create Budget
suggestionPrompts.prompt: I need help creating a monthly budget that works for my lifestyle. Can you guide me through tracking expenses and setting financial goals?
suggestionPrompts.description: Build effective budgets and manage monthly expenses

suggestionPrompts.label: Emergency Fund
suggestionPrompts.prompt: I want to build an emergency fund. How much should I save, where should I keep it, and how do I start building it systematically?
suggestionPrompts.description: Build and maintain emergency savings for financial security

suggestionPrompts.label: Debt Management
suggestionPrompts.prompt: I need help managing my debt effectively. What strategies can you recommend for paying off credit cards, loans, and other debts?
suggestionPrompts.description: Strategies for paying off debt and improving credit

suggestionPrompts.label: Tax Planning
suggestionPrompts.prompt: I need advice on tax planning and optimization. What strategies should I consider to minimize my tax burden legally?
suggestionPrompts.description: Tax optimization strategies and deduction planning

suggestionPrompts.label: Insurance Planning
suggestionPrompts.prompt: I want to understand what insurance coverage I need. Can you help me evaluate life, health, disability, and property insurance options?
suggestionPrompts.description: Comprehensive insurance coverage planning and evaluation

suggestionPrompts.label: Home Buying
suggestionPrompts.prompt: I'm thinking about buying a home. Can you help me understand the financial aspects, mortgage options, and how much house I can afford?
suggestionPrompts.description: Navigate the financial aspects of home purchasing
